TV. As a child I was an avid Tv watcher - but it did
not dull my 
imagination. We would go out and play *Wagon Train*
*The 
Buccaneers* and *Brave Eagle* - now that IS giving away


Back to TV and vid and films...

Dh went to see Hannibal with a friend the other week.
Said friend told dh that he'd have to have a chat with
his son (9 or 10yo) cos he'd found him watching
American Pie... Dh told me this while we were watching
American Pie... 'Umm,' I said, 'good on 'im!' At
least he'll know it's not a one-way street *grin*

Tracy

messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] illegal
messages.msgSnippet: Does anyone else keep getting that little box popping up that reads *This program has perfomed and illegal operation* ***The only time this happens to me is
messages.messageBody:
Does anyone else keep getting that little box popping up that reads
*This program has perfomed and illegal operation*

***The only time this happens to me is when I have too much junk stored. I
delete all messages (sent, received, etc) and dump my deleted file. That
usually clears it up. (oh, then I shut the machine down and start
over...this helps for some reason)

Valerie in Tacoma

messages.subject: illegal
messages.msgSnippet: Does anyone else keep getting that little box popping up that reads *This program has perfomed and illegal operation* It only happens on this Group - but
messages.messageBody:
Does anyone else keep getting that little box popping up that reads
*This program has perfomed and illegal operation*
It only happens on this Group - but happens 2-3 times during the time
it takes me to read all the messages.

TV. As a child I was an avid Tv watcher - but it did not dull my
imagination. We would go out and play *Wagon Train* *The
Buccaneers* and *Brave Eagle* - now that IS giving away my age!!!
mariane
